lab2

接口 StuListInterface

  • 所有已知实现类:
    StuList

    public interface StuListInterface

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean addStu(Student s)
      Appends the Student s to the end of Student list.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Returns true if this Student list contains no elements.
      void print()
      Output the basic information of each Student in StuList.
      Student removeStu_id(int id)
      Removes the Student whose id equals the id parameter in this StuList.
      Student removeStu(int index)
      Removes the Student at the specified position in this StuList.
      int size()
      Returns the number of Students in this StuList.
      void sort()
      Sort the Students List by GPA.

    • 方法详细资料

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Returns true if this Student list contains no elements.
        返回:
        true if this Student list contains no elements

      • size

        int size()
        Returns the number of Students in this StuList.
        返回:
        the number of Students in this StuList

      • addStu

        boolean addStu(Student s)
        Appends the Student s to the end of Student list.
        参数:
        s - Student to be appended to this StuList
        返回:
        true if the StuList has enough space to append a Student

      • removeStu

        Student removeStu(int index)
        Removes the Student at the specified position in this StuList. Shifts any subsequent Students to the left (subtracts one from their indices).
        参数:
        index - the index of the Student to be removed
        返回:
        the Student that was removed from the StuList

      • removeStu_id

        Student removeStu_id(int id)
        Removes the Student whose id equals the id parameter in this StuList. Shifts any subsequent Students to the left (subtracts one from their indices).
        参数:
        id - the id of the Student to be removed
        返回:
        the Student that was removed from the StuList

      • sort

        void sort()
        Sort the Students List by GPA.

      • print

        void print()
        Output the basic information of each Student in StuList. The basic information includes StuID, Name, GPA
